datasource.sql: --设备列表 SELECT DISCOVEREDDATE,CASE WHEN DEFECTPROPERTIES = 3 THEN '一般' WHEN DEFECTPROPERTIES = 2 THEN '严重' ELSE '危急' END AS DEFECTPROPERTIES, DEFECTCONTENT,CASE WHEN DEFECTPROPERTIES = 3 THEN DISCOVEREDDATE+90 WHEN DEFECTPROPERTIES = 2 THEN DISCOVEREDDATE+30 ELSE DISCOVEREDDATE+1 END AS JHWCSJ, DISCOVEREDDATE AS STARTTIME,CORRECTIVEDATE,round(to_number(to_date(TO_CHAR(DECODE(CORRECTIVEDATE,NULL,SYSDATE,CORRECTIVEDATE),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') - to_date(TO_CHAR(DISCOVEREDDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'))*24*60*60,2) AS CXSC FROM DEVICEPARAM.TF_DEFECTRECORD A WHERE A.DEVICESTRID = {0} AND DISCOVEREDDATE >= {{1}} AND DISCOVEREDDATE<={{2}} ORDER BY DISCOVEREDDATE
